verses.verse: <S%G3739>What<s%> was from the <S%G746>beginning,<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> we have <S%G191>heard,<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> we have <S%G3708>seen<s%> with our <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> we <S%G2300>beheld<s%> and our <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G5584>handled,<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G3056>Word<s%> of <S%G2222>Life<s%> –

and the <S%G2222>life<s%> was <S%G5319>manifested,<s%> and we have <S%G3708>seen<s%> and <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> and <S%G518>proclaim<s%> to you the <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> was with the <S%G3962>Father<s%> and was <S%G5319>manifested<s%> to us –

<S%G3739>what<s%> we have <S%G3708>seen<s%> and <S%G191>heard<s%> we <S%G518>proclaim<s%> to you <S%G2532>also,<s%> that you <S%G2532>also<s%> may <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> with us; and <S%G2532>indeed<s%> our <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> is with the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and with His <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
And <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> we <S%G1125>write,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that our <S%G5479>joy<s%> may be <S%G4137>made<s%> <S%G4137>complete.<s%>

And <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G31>message<s%> we have <S%G191>heard<s%> from Him and <S%G312>announce<s%> to you, that <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G5457>light,<s%> and in Him there is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4653>darkness<s%> at <S%G3762>all.<s%>

<S%G1437>If<s%> we <S%G3004>say<s%> that we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> with Him and [yet] <S%G4043>walk<s%> in the <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> we <S%G5574>lie<s%> and do not <S%G4160>practice<s%> the <S%G225>truth;<s%>

but <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G4043>walk<s%> in the <S%G5457>light<s%> as He <S%G846>Himself<s%> is in the <S%G5457>light,<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> with <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> and the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> His <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2511>cleanses<s%> us from <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G266>sin.<s%>
<S%G1437>If<s%> we <S%G3004>say<s%> that we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> we are <S%G4105>deceiving<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves,<s%> and the <S%G225>truth<s%> is not in us.

<S%G1437>If<s%> we <S%G3670>confess<s%> our <S%G266>sins,<s%> He is <S%G4103>faithful<s%> and <S%G1342>righteous<s%> to <S%G863>forgive<s%> us our <S%G266>sins<s%> and to <S%G2511>cleanse<s%> us from <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness.<s%>
<S%G1437>If<s%> we <S%G3004>say<s%> that we have not <S%G264>sinned,<s%> we <S%G4160>make<s%> Him a <S%G5583>liar,<s%> and His <S%G3056>word<s%> is not in us.
